profile.name: Hesham Shawqy
profile.title: Computational Designer
bio: Hesham Shawqy is an architect and computational designer specializing in computational design, artificial intelligence, and web development. Currently serving as Computational Design Specialist at Grimshaw, London, he also leads the Complex Forming seminar as part of the MACAD program at IAAC (Institute for Advanced Architecture of Catalonia).

He earned his Master's degree in Advanced Computation for Architecture & Design in 2021, with research interests centered on digitizing handcrafts through machine learning and robotic fabrication. His diverse portfolio spans product design, historical documentation, urban development, museum exhibits, and housing projects.
